item.description:
On Sunday, April 29th, I will be opening up my home for free for all gaming to occur starting 10:00 AM and going till about 10:00pm or so. You are welcome to bring guests, food, beer, and games to play! I will have two large tables and, if need be, a smaller table for some two player games. Beverages will be provided (water, soda, etc) and some snacks will be on hand. Chip in for lunch and dinner and I can order pizza or whatever.

Games I am personally hoping to get to the table are 7 wonders, Show Manager, Carson City, possibly Power Boats, Nefarious (if it arrives on time), and Rex (if it arrives on time). I am open to play whatever though as I am sure others would be too.

Hope you can make it for some good gaming!
item.name: Sunday Gaming in Laconia
